summary: Kuldeep Yadav is an Indian cricketer.

value.label: Kuldeep Yadav
Kanpur, India
Indian
Bowler
Slow left-arm chinaman bowler.
Kuldeep Yadav plays first class Indian domestic cricket for Uttar Pradesh
The Ranji Trophy is a domestic first-class cricket championship played in India between teams representing regional and state cricket associations.

value.label: Yadav made his Test debut for India against Australia in 2017, at Dharamshala
The Australia national cricket team is the joint oldest team in Test cricket history, having played in the first ever Test match in 1877.

value.label: Yadav was a member of the Mumbai Indians squad in 2012

The Mumbai Indians are a franchise cricket team based in the city of Mumbai, Maharashtra. Founded in 2008, Mumbai Indians play in the Indian Premier League (IPL). The team is owned by India's biggest conglomerate, Reliance Industries.

value.label: Yadav is the third bowler for India to score a hat-trick in a One Day International.

image.altText: Yadav is the third bowler for India to score a hat-trick in a One Day International.

value.label: Kuldeep Yadav is the first Slow-left-arm chinaman bowler to represent India in Test cricket

image.altText: Kuldeep Yadav is the first Slow-left-arm chinaman bowler to represent India in Test cricket

value.label: Yadav is the first left-arm chinaman bowler to take 5 wickets in a T20I

image.altText: Yadav is the first left-arm chinaman bowler to take 5 wickets in a T20I

value.label: In 2018 versus England, Yadav registered the best bowling figures by a chinaman bowler in an ODI (6/25)

image.altText: In 2018 versus England, Yadav registered the best bowling figures by a chinaman bowler in an ODI (6/25)

value.label: In 2018 versus West Indies, Yadav he took his first five-wicket haul in Test matches

image.altText: In 2018 versus West Indies, Yadav he took his first five-wicket haul in Test matches

value.label: The India national cricket team is also known as Team India and Men in Blue. India is ranked first in Tests, second in ODIs and second in T20Is by the ICC. Virat Kohli is the current captain of the team, while the head coach is Ravi Shastri.

image.altText: Picture of India national cricket team

value.label: The Uttar Pradesh cricket team, is a domestic team based in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh with Kanpur as its home ground
